desc: Want to be part of the largest group-writing project in human history? Learn how to contribute to Wikipedia, the user-generated online reference for the 21st century. Considered more popular than eBay, Microsoft.com, and Amazon.com, Wikipedia generates approximately 30,000 requests per second, or about 2.5 billion per day. Itâ€™s become the first point of reference for people the world over who need a fact fast.
title: Wikipedia: The Missing Manual
